IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_mercenary_quest_mission_value') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_mercenary_quest_mission_value GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_mercenary_quest_mission_value @character_id dbo.id_t, @current_value TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Mercenary_Quests SET @current_value = current_value WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
